title: The Importance of Quiet Time | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Importance of Quiet Time | Joel Osteen
description:
Just like our bodies need rest, our minds need a break from the demands of life. When you set aside time to let your mind rest each day, God will use that time to refresh and restore you.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
